word: SHE WAS MARRIED TO JAMES WHITE ON AUGUST 30, 1846, AFTER ASSURING HERSELF THROUGH PRAYER THAT THIS WAS A PROPER STEP. IT SHOULD BE NOTED THAT SHE WAS WELL INTO HER MINISTRY, FOR SHE HAD FOR TWENTY MONTHS BEEN THE RECIPIENT OF VISIONS FROM THE LORD. AS A RESULT OF THIS UNION WITH JAMES WHITE SHE GAVE BIRTH TO FOUR SONS, BORN IN 1847, 1849, 1854, AND 1860.
